item.title: Working on Multiple Web Projects with Docker Compose and Traefik
item.description: I work on multiple web projects and run local development servers for each of them. I often have to switch between them and sometimes it's useful to have multiple projects up at the same time. Recently I've found a way that makes managing these more enjoyable. A single project with Docker Compose I use docker compose to manage local development instances of these projects. A typical compose file for a web project might look like this:
